param.name: range
param.comment: 'zone','sector','cluster', some presets such as 'pmc', and list of spaces

append_to_list.name: $space
append_to_list.exact: if this.ship.jobmainzone then this.ship.jobmainzone else this.ship.zone

append_to_list.name: $space
append_to_list.exact: if this.ship.jobmainzone then this.ship.jobmainzone.sector else this.ship.sector

append_to_list.name: $space
append_to_list.exact: if this.ship.jobmainzone then this.ship.jobmainzone.cluster else this.ship.cluster

append_to_list.name: $space
append_to_list.exact: if this.ship.jobmainzone then this.ship.jobmainzone.cluster else this.ship.cluster

append_to_list.name: $space
append_to_list.exact: if this.ship.jobmainzone then this.ship.jobmainzone.sector else this.ship.sector

debug_text.text: 'Could not decode String-Based Range:\n$range= %1 , Object Name= %2 , Ship Job ID= %3 '.[$range,this.container.knownname,this.ship.job]

append_to_list.name: $space
append_to_list.exact: if this.ship.jobmainzone then this.ship.jobmainzone.cluster else this.ship.cluster

append_to_list.name: $space
append_to_list.exact: if this.ship.jobmainzone then this.ship.jobmainzone.sector else this.ship.sector

do_if.value: ($range.{$i}.isclass.zone and (not $range.{$i}.isclass.highway) and (not $range.{$i}.istemporaryzone)) or $range.{$i}.isclass.sector or $range.{$i}.isclass.cluster or typeof $range.{$i} == datatype.macro

do_elseif.value: ($range.isclass.zone and (not $range.isclass.highway) and (not $range.istemporaryzone)) or $range.isclass.sector or $range.isclass.cluster or typeof $range == datatype.macro

append_to_list.name: $space
append_to_list.exact: if this.ship.jobmainzone then this.ship.jobmainzone.cluster else this.ship.cluster

append_to_list.name: $space
append_to_list.exact: if this.ship.jobmainzone then this.ship.jobmainzone.sector else this.ship.sector

debug_text.text: 'Invalid Value for $space.{$i} provided:\n$range= %1 , Object Name= %2 , Ship Job ID= %3 , $space.{$i} = %4'.[$range,this.container.knownname,this.ship.job,$space.{$i}]
'Decoding $range resulted in an Empty List, falling back to current Zone to avoid further Errors:\n$range= %1 , Object Name= %2 , Ship Job ID= %3 '.[$range,this.container.knownname,this.ship.job]

append_to_list.name: $zones
append_to_list.exact: if this.ship.jobmainzone and this.ship.jobmainzone.exists then this.ship.jobmainzone else this.ship.zone
